item.description:
Currently sold-out, unless some tickets are turned-in and re-sold. You can still try at burialboys.com, but there may not be any. The only other way to try to get a ticket is to email one of the producers and see if they've gotten any turned back in. Email:
miked@establishmentproductions.tv You can also check the Facebook event, some people there are posting they have extra tickets.
http://www.facebook.c...

The producers of a locally-made comedy feature film I'm in ("Burial Boys") are staging a red carpet premiere this Thursday at the Wallingford cinemas

After-party with free champagne & tacos at Los Mariachis (105 No. Colony St, Wallingford). $2 drafts & $4 margaritas.

You won't see me on-screen a lot though, I'm a small character (flamboyantly gay perverted makeup artist). See photo for a look at my character.

TRAILER: (unrated, NSFW) Here (film rated R)

TICKETS: Sold online. Get them soon before it sells-out
www.burialboys.com

HOST: Jason, cell 203-901-4957 (texting is fine too)

PARKING: Free

SYNOPSIS: Royce (Aaron Sandler) is home for the holidays, but while back from College, his Grandma unexpectedly passes away. She leaves behind the family business (a funeral home) to her only grandson. Royce chooses to take on his Grandmother's legacy with the help of his best friend Seppy (Christopher Husta). Things get tough as the two friends try to run things on their own, dealing with some serious debt to the IRS. While running out of options, Royce and Seppy put together a diabolical plan to save the funeral home. MURDER those in town they can't stand - and COLLECT.
item.how_to_find_us: Text me when you arrive. Also, I'm tall (6'3")
item.name: Thu. 9/2 - Red carpet premiere of a feature film I'm in, + party
